Name: Potion
Effects: Heals a Pokémon 10 hit points.

Name: Super Potion
Effects: Heals a Pokémon 20 hit points.

Name: Hyper Potion
Effects: Heals a Pokémon 30 hit points.

Name: Max Potion
Effects: Heals a Pokémon to their Max HP.

Name: Full Restore
Effects: Heals a Pokémon to their Max HP and cures them of any afflictions.

Name: Potion Water
Effects: Heals a Human10 hit points.

Name: Super Soda
Effects: Heals a Human 20 hit points.

Name: Hyper Lemonade
Effects: Heals a Human 30 hit points.

Name: Antidote
Effects: Cures a Pokémon or human of Poisoning or Toxification.

Name: Paralyze Heal
Effects: Cures a Pokémon or human or Paralysis.

Name: Awakening
Effects: Cures a Pokémon or human of being unnaturally Asleep.

Name: Burn Heal
Effects: Cures a Pokémon or human of Burns.

Name: Ice Heal
Effects: Cures a Pokémon or human of Freezing.

Name: Full Heal
Effects: Cures a Pokémon or human of all afflictions (excluding Curses).

Name: Ether
Effects: A Pokémon’s strength is partially restored and can again use one of its 1/day or 3/day frequency moves as if it has taken an extended rest.

Name: Elixer
Effects: A Pokémon’s strength is restored and can again use its 1/day or 3/day frequency moves as if it taken an extended rest.

Name: HP Up
Effects: Permanently increase HP by 4.

Name: Protein
Effects: Permanently increase Attack by 1.

Name: Iron
Effects: Permanently increase Defense by 1.

Name: Calcium
Effects: Permanently increase Sp. Attack by 1.

Name: Zinc
Effects: Permanently increase Sp. Def by 1.

Name: Carbos
Effects: Permanently increase speed by 1.

Name: Revive
Effects: Restore an unconscious Pokémon to half of its max HP.

Name: Max Revive
Effects: Restore an unconscious Pokémon to its max HP.

Name: Repel
Effects: Wild Pokémon find the smell repul- sive for one hour after applied, but may ignore it to protect something precious to them.

Name: Super Repel
Effects: Wild Pokémon find the smell repul- sive for three hours after applied, but may ignore it to protect something precious to them.

Name: Heal Powder
Effects: Removes any affliction

Name: Energy Powder
Effects: Recovers 15 Hit Points (Pokémon)

Name: Energy Root
Effects: Recovers 30 Hit Points (Pokémon)

Name: Revival Herb
Effects: Recovers an unconscious Pokémon to half of their max HP.

Name: Made Mint
Effects: When consumed by a Pokémon, this mint will change a stat to be positively or negatively affected for the Pokémon. Change the Pokémon’s nature to match the new positive or negatively affected stat, adjusting the other stat that is no longer tied to nature. You cannot neutralize a nature with Made Mint, instead they must always affect different stats.

Name: X Attack
Effects: Increases a Pokémon's Attack by 1 for 2 mins. This effect does not stack.

Name: X Defend
Effects: Increases a Pokémon's Defense by 1 for 2 mins. This effect does not stack.

Name: X Special
Effects: Increases a Pokémon's Special Attack by 1 for 2 mins. This effect does not stack.

Name: X Special Defend
Effects: Increases a Pokémon's Special Defense by 1 for 2 mins. This effect does not stack.

Name: X Speed
Effects: Increases a Pokémon's Speedby 1 for 2 mins. This effect does not stack.

Name: X Accuracy
Effects: Increases a Pokémon's accuracy checkby 1 for 1 min. This effect does not stack.
